titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to grant a special use permit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations.

bill.summary: 4/19/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) issue a special use permit allowing the installation, operation, and maintenance of a communications shelter and associated antennas within the boundaries of Katmai National Park and Preserve at Cape Gull, under specified conditions; and (2) charge fees for processing the permit application and use of Federal lands.
